name: DLN
description: Experience native cross-chain trading with deep liquidity, advanced limit orders, and lightning-fast execution. Powered by deBridge
chains_supported: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon PoS, Avalanche...
auction_design_details: The first accepted solver bid automatically wins the auction irrespective of whether another bid comes in at roughly the same time with a better price or outcome for the user
auction_openness_details: Auctions occur entirely on chain with no auction period of shielded competition window, however there is a preferential window where a nominated filler is able to submit a bid ahead of others and be automatically accepted.
filler_diversity_details: Protocol acts as it's own solver and doesn't allow for permissionless participation
censorship_resistance_details: Whilst there are no mechanisms on-chain by which the protocol can prevent an order from being accepted, since the protocol is the only solver it creates a centralisation risk whereby at any point censorship of orderflow can occur.
filler_failure_resistance_details: If the protocol filler fails there is no other way to fill an order and no way for the user to get their funds back on the source chain.
